This is the second part in a 3-step method to utilise and clear the Hardened Resin that the Hiveminds excrete around them.
The Liquifier uses a heated plasma stream to liquify and extract the soft insides of Liquified Hard Resin.
You can then use a Liquid Resin Refiner to convert this to Refined Liquid Resin.
To convert from Hard Resin to Ablated Hard Resin, use a Hard Resin Ablator
